Subject: Zombie Tag
Description: You're it! Be on the lookout for a ribbon that says 'I'm a walker.' Once you've been infected, seek out your zombie brethren and infect others! Those presenting you with a zombie tag ribbon will give you further instructions.. for eating braaaaaiiins!  Speakers include:Tim Slovik

Subject: Ribbon Fairy
Description: Have you seen a lovely winged fairy distributing ribbons? She only has one rule, 'Give a ribbon, get a ribbon.' Look for her about the convention spreading ribbon fairy dust all over the place.  Speakers include:Ribbon Fairy

Subject: Find Waldo
Description: Where's Waldo? He's somewhere amidst the rest of the hordes of awesome Penguicon attendees. Search every dark corner, every broad gallery, any other place he can be seen in plain sight. Please, don't search occupied bathroom stalls. We get in trouble for that sort of thing. If you find him, you'll be rewarded with a special ribbon.  Speakers include:Waldo

Subject: WoW Questing Game
Description: Whether you are a fan of World of Warcraft or a fan of scavenger hunts or a fan of random quests, you will enjoy the nuances of this cherished challenge. Get your pally butt out of the Con Suite and go on an adventure!  Speakers include:Open

Subject: Juggling for People Who Think They Can't Juggle
Description: If you have tried to juggle in the past, and not gotten it, this is the class for you! Jody will be teaching the basics of a standard 3-ball cascade (the basic 'juggle') in a brain-based, science-informed method. Trust me, if you acn toss a single ball from hand to hand, you can learn to juggle 3 balls in under an hour. All ages welcome, under 16 with adult please.  Speakers include:Jody Raiford

Subject: General Juggling Gather and Meetup
Description: Whether you're a new player looking to pick up the basics or an advanced twister looking to toss some nine-pins, come on in and help us fill the air with toys and chat. Jody will be hosting, but you'll be the stars! Mingle and show off your skills with fellow enthusiasts.  Speakers include:Jody Raiford
